data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Joharchi, Omid, Moradi, Maryam (2013): Review of the genus Myrmozercon Berlese (Acari: Laelapidae), with description of two new species from Iran. Zootaxa 3686 (2): 244-254, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3686.2.6
